article_title: Arkansas Governor Tries To Muzzle Opposition To State's ObamaCare Medicaid Expansion

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: In late May, Apothecary editors received an email from Matt DeCample, communications director and spokesman for Arkansas Governor Mike Beebe. Apparently DeCample was none-too-pleased with our reporting, or what he calls “political activism being spread under the Forbes banner.”
